price: ئەھلى دوزاخ بىلەن ئەھلى جەننەت باراۋەر بولمايدۇ، ئەھلى جەننەت بولسا مەقسەتكە ئېرىشكۈچىلەردۇر[20].
arabic: لَا يَسۡتَوِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۚ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yastawī aṣḥābu al-nāri wa-aṣḥābu al-janati aṣḥābu al-janati humu al-fāizūna
